searchDocs.title: Settings​
searchDocs.content: </> interface Settings { Colour: Color3?, -- The colour of your visualiser Width: number?,-- How wide your visualiser is Scale: number?,-- How big the scale factor of your direction is } Settings for specifying how your visualiser looks like.

searchDocs.title: CreateVisualiser​
searchDocs.content: </> VectorViz:CreateVisualiser( ObjectName: string,-- The name you want to use to identify your visualiser OriginPoint: Vector3 ,-- The origin of your visualiser Direction: Vector3 ,-- Where your visualiser points towards. The beam scales linearly with the size of your direction Settings: Settings?-- The visuals you want your beam to have ) → () This function creates a visualiser object You must keep a note of the ObjectName if you want to destroy or update the visualiser

searchDocs.title: UpdateBeam​
searchDocs.content: </> VectorViz:UpdateBeam( ObjectName: string,-- The visualiser you want to edit OriginPoint: Vector3 ,-- The new origin of your visualiser Direction: Vector3 -- The new direction of your visualiser ) → () Simply updates your visualiser to fit your new vector

searchDocs.title: UpdateVisualiserAppearance​
searchDocs.content: </> VectorViz:UpdateVisualiserAppearance( ObjectName: string,-- The visualiser you want to edit Settings: Settings?-- Your new settings ) → () Updates how your visualiser looks

searchDocs.title: DestroyVisualiser​
searchDocs.content: </> VectorViz:DestroyVisualiser( ObjectName: string-- The visualiser you want to destroy ) → () Destroys your visualiser object
